Topic.Title: [@last] function only works on the ScratchPad

Posts.EditableText:
I copy-pasted the [@last] function example script: doesn't work on the Squiffy program nor when I export as html/java

http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/squiffy/turncount.html

It only works on ScratchPad.

Any chance for a fix on this? For the record I'm running on the latest version of Squiffy: 5.0
